trans-unit.source: Provides a simple implementation of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer" /> 接口的简单实现。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> object can be used to store and provide services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>对象可以用于存储和提供服务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> 实现 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> objects, including the immediate parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>可以使用添加父构造函数创建对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>通过哪些服务可以根据需要添加到或从所有父级中移除<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>对象，包括直接父<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a service from all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> implementations that are linked to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through parenting, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加或删除服务从所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>链接至此的实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>设置父级，通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>接受一个布尔值，该值指示是否以提升的服务请求的方法重载.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>特性应用于此类具有以下<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>属性值： <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example program demonstrates service chaining and the resultant service availability of a chain of linked <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例程序演示服务链接和由此产生的服务可用性的链链接<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>对象。

trans-unit.source: The program provides a user interface that allows you to see the availability of services within a chain of linked services, and uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.GetService%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> methods as well as linked service containers.
trans-unit.target: 该程序提供一个用户界面，允许你查看链接的服务链中的服务的可用性，并使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.GetService%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>方法，以及链接的服务容器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: 父服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> class using the specified parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的父服务提供程序初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.
trans-unit.target: 服务容器使用此服务对象提供程序检索服务，如果它们不容器中的本地可用。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: 可创建该服务的回调对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: 它允许将服务声明为可用，但是会将对象的创建延迟到请求该服务之后。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to add a service to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将服务添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> or <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 或 <paramref name="callback" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A service of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 容器中已存在类型为 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 的服务。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务的实例。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the <c>serviceType</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此对象必须实现 <c>serviceType</c> 参数所指示的类型或从其继承。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to add a service to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将服务添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> or <paramref name="serviceInstance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 或 <paramref name="serviceInstance" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A service of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 容器中已存在类型为 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 的服务。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: 可创建该服务的回调对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: 它允许将服务声明为可用，但是会将对象的创建延迟到请求该服务之后。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应将此服务添加到任何父服务容器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> or <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 或 <paramref name="callback" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A service of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 容器中已存在类型为 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 的服务。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service type to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的服务类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the <c>serviceType</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此对象必须实现 <c>serviceType</c> 参数所指示的类型或从其继承。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应将此服务添加到任何父服务容器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> or <paramref name="serviceInstance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 或 <paramref name="serviceInstance" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A service of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 容器中已存在类型为 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 的服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default services implemented directly by <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> 直接实现的默认服务。

trans-unit.source: The default services.
trans-unit.target: 默认服务。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回直接在此实现的默认服务<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: the default implementation of this property is to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> types.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认实现是返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>类型。

trans-unit.source: You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会重写此属性并返回您自己的类型，修改的默认行为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: 释放此服务容器。

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: 释放此服务容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> 指导容器内的所有实例化的服务并释放任何实现<xref:System.IDisposable>，并清除服务列表。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> is in the process of being disposed of; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer" /> 正在被释放的过程中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: 释放此服务容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> 指导容器内的所有实例化的服务并释放任何实现<xref:System.IDisposable>，并清除服务列表。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的服务。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service if it could be found, or <see langword="null" /> if it could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以找到服务，则为该服务的实例；如果未能找到服务，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 从服务容器中移除指定的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 从服务容器中移除指定的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to remove a service from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从某一服务删除<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this service should be removed from any parent service containers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应该从任何父服务容器中移除此服务，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 从服务容器中移除指定的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
